data.message: All you dumbasses complaining that it ain't an album full of new music need to shut up. First of all, it's the anniversary of shady records so of course they're gonna throw in the greatest hits. Second of all, be grateful that they threw in a whole disk FULL of NEW material. Some fans you are

replies.message: Please don't call disc V a "greatest hits" album.  It's a radio single album.  There's no way any of the songs on disc V are the greatest songs by any of those artists.
